column1: #Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " This Mako 's got moxy !
#Text=" Korra says : " You shut it off at the best part !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I thought I made myself clear .
#Text=I do n't want you listening to this distracting nonsense .
#Text=" Korra says : " But it 's their radio .
#Text=And technically , you said I could n't watch a match .
#Text=You did n't say anything about listening to one .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You - ... you know what I meant !
#Text=Should n't you be in bed by now ?
